mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, title, type, status, last_message_time, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted FROM chat_session WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY last_message_time DESC, created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_session SET last_message_time = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE chat_session SET title = #{title}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
